Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -24,8 +24,9 @@
About Me
+

I'm very interested generally in how humans can use technology to improve their lives. Specifically to coding, I love user interfaces that are highly intuitive for beginners and also provide a path for more powerful use that unfolds as the user spends time working with the interface. I find these interfaces very elegant, and I really appreciate elegant coding also.

Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -25,17 +25,20 @@
About Me
-

- I'm very interested generally in how humans can use technology to improve their lives. Specifically to coding, I love user interfaces that are highly intuitive for beginners and also provide a path for more powerful use that unfolds as the user spends time working with the interface. I find these interfaces very elegant, and I really appreciate elegant coding also. -

-

- For the past thirty years I have worked in the real estate development business, and I have been a real estate entrepreneur running my own business since 2003. Real estate development has many aspects that are similar to software development: collaboration, creativity, and making a product, to name three. Since I was a child, I've loved coding, but my career path led me to real estate until this time. I'm very excited to be able to work in coding now. -

-

- Education: BS Environmental Design, UC Berkeley; MBA, UC Berkeley. Currently enrolled in UC Berkeley Extension Full Stack Coding Bootcamp. -

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
Stuart Rickard

  • About
  • Work
  • Contact
  • Resume

Thinking Outside the Flexbox

About Me

I'm very interested generally in how humans can use technology to improve their lives. Specifically to coding, I love user interfaces that are highly intuitive for beginners and also provide a path for more powerful use that unfolds as the user spends time working with the interface. I find these interfaces very elegant, and I really appreciate elegant coding also.

For the past thirty years I have worked in the real estate development business, and I have been a real estate entrepreneur running my own business since 2003. Real estate development has many aspects that are similar to software development: collaboration, creativity, and making a product, to name three. Since I was a child, I've loved coding, but my career path led me to real estate until this time. I'm very excited to be able to work in coding now.

Education: BS Environmental Design, UC Berkeley; MBA, UC Berkeley. Currently enrolled in UC Berkeley Extension Full Stack Coding Bootcamp.

Work
circles

Uses the CSS box model to rotate concentric circles within one another

Abstract Art

Generates Mondrian-like compositions using the CSS box model

Run Buddy

A two-page website made as part of my coding bootcamp course

Calculator

Numbers are its specialty

BAU

HTML-only website I created for my company before I took the coding bootcamp course

Contact Me
